charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed to the spot
where [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] and Calem had planned to meet.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1101_0200_:
Calem was indeed at the spot, but he
seemed preoccupied.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_0300_:
That feeling of waiting year after year after year,
without any guarantee of meeting again...
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_0500_:
Oh! I wasn’t actually talking about me...
While I was waiting for you, I suddenly
remembered this person I used to know.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_0700_:
Oh! I wasn’t actually talking about me...
While I was waiting for you, I suddenly
remembered this person I used to know.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_0800_:
When I was traveling around Kalos,
I met this really tall Trainer.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_0900_:
He’d been separated from his partner Pokémon
long, long ago, and he had been searching for it
ever since.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1000_:
For three thousand years, he looked for his
Pokémon. I know—it sounds absurd.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1100_:
But it got me thinking. What would I do if you
didn’t show up for three thousand years?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1200_:
*sigh*
Yeah, I’d probably go home.
I’d wait for about 30 minutes and then go home.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1300_:
If it were Serena, she wouldn’t even wait
three minutes.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1400_:
But if I were separated from Espurr and had to
look for him for the next three thousand years...
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1500_: I couldn’t do that. I know I would lose heart.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1600_:
I care for Espurr a lot, but if I were asked if I
care for him that much? Well, it makes me think.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0301_1800_:
Three thousand years?
Sure, I could do that.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_1900_:
Seriously? You even said it so easily.
You really are something special.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_2100_:
Yeah, I mean, three thousand years...
How many lifetimes is that?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2200_:
“When the ice and snow melt, spring arrives...
You and your Pokémon will be together 
for many years to come.”
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2300_:
Pryce, the Gym Leader in Mahogany Town, said
those words to me.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2400_:
But I wonder, if you spend that much time with
your Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2500_:
would you be more willing to wait three
thousand years for them?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2600_:
I don’t know. I guess there’s not even much of
a point in thinking about it, either.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2900_:
You’ve been using your psychic powers for the
last few minutes, haven’t you?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_3000_:
You in a good mood or something?
What have you been getting up to over there?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1101_3000_:
With a twinkle in his eye, Espurr gave Calem
a flower he had been levitating with his
psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_3100_:
Hm? A flower?
That’s a pretty shade of purple.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_3200_:
Have you been making this flower levitate for me
this whole time?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_3400_:
He can hold it longer or shorter depending on
the day.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_3500_: Today looks like his record time!
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_3700_:
Yeah, I think Espurr is a bit more on the
resilient side.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_3800_:
Although whenever I get one of his favorite
Poké Puffs, he does get a little antsy.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_3900_: Sorry for making you wait, Espurr.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4000_: You really are a trooper, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_4200_: He said that it’s fine because he likes waiting.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_4400_: He said that it’s fine because he likes waiting.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4500_:
I get the feeling that I understood what he was
trying to say...although I don’t know if I was
even close.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4600_:
Sorry I said earlier that I probably wouldn’t look
for you for three thousand years.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4700_:
I’m your Trainer—I won’t ever make you wait
that long.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4800_: But if we were to ever get separated...
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4900_:
Yeah, I’d look for you. Three thousand years,
ten thousand years—it doesn’t matter. I’ll look
for you no matter how long it takes.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_1201_0100_:
So you wanna battle old Nanu, huh? You
sure you’ve thought this through?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_1201_0200_:
I still want to to get stronger—strong enough that
I can always take care of my Espurr!
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_1201_0300_:
Are you really ready for this?
I’m not going to go easy on you.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0101_0100_: Well, I guess it’s time to find out who’s stronger.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0100_: Heh, you’re pretty strong, aren’t you, kid?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0200_: We did it, Espurr! But...what’s happening to you?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0300_:
Looks like your partner’s evolving.
I guess congratulations are in order.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0400_:
Whoa, this is awesome, Espurr!
We’re getting stronger!
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0500_:
Let’s stick together and become the greatest
sync pair of them all!
